name: Peerless Hunter
prerequisite: 21st level, Wis 17, ranger, Hunterâ€™s Quarry class feature
benefit: When designating a target as your quarry, you can designate a second target within 5 squares of the first target as your quarry as well. When you designate a third target as your quarry, you decide which of the previous two quarries is no longer your quarry.
